description:
'''Leroy Hutson''' (born June 4, 1945) is an American [[soul music|soul]] and [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] singer, songwriter, [[Arrangement|arranger]], [[Record producer|producer]] and instrumentalist, best known as former lead singer of R&B vocal group [[The Impressions]].

His music concerns 1970s soul, as noted in the June 29, 2006 issue of ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' magazine. He is the father of producer [[JR Hutson]].{{full citation needed|date=March 2015}}
